attributes.additional_details: Mercia, Southern Wales, Wessex, Sussex, Essex and East Anglea were all former Anglo-Saxon Kingdoms, which were all conquered and then eventually all ruled with the rest of the land under one Monarchy known as England. England was created without any acts of union, hence the England is an illegal country. The British Government should give referendums for indepenence to the current dessendents of these former and rightful Kingdoms.
